item.title: Trump to Unveil Farmer Aid as China Shuns U.S. Crops
item.description: As it did in 2018, the White House plans to dole out relief funds to struggling U.S. farmers who have lost their biggest customer.

item.title: Mass Layoffs Trump Is Threatening in Shutdown Fight May Be Illegal
item.description: Unions have sued to block any firings, which budget experts believe are not even needed to protect essential federal services.

item.title: Nobel Prize in Physics Is Awarded for Work in Quantum Mechanics
item.description: John Clarke, Michel H. Devoret and John M. Martinis were recognized for work that made behaviors of the subatomic realm observable at a larger scale.

item.title: An Ideological Revolution Needs 12 Years in Power
item.description: The Trump administration has a long way to go.
